columns.name: name
columns.description: The friendly name to identify the option group.

columns.name: arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the option group.

columns.name: description
columns.description: Provides a description of the option group.

columns.name: allows_vpc_and_non_vpc_instance_memberships
columns.description: Specifies whether this option group can be applied to both VPC and non-VPC instances.

columns.name: engine_name
columns.description: Indicates the name of the engine that this option group can be applied to.

columns.name: major_engine_version
columns.description: Indicates the major engine version associated with this option group.

columns.name: vpc_id
columns.description: Indicates the ID of the VPC, option group can be applied.

columns.name: options
columns.description: Indicates what options are available in the option group.

columns.name: tags_src
columns.description: A list of tags attached to the option group.
